data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Điện Biên, Vietnam to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Điện Biên, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Điện Biên, Vietnam. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Điện Biên
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Điện Biên, Vietnam to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Tsun-Lao people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Jesus, help the church in the state of Điện Biên to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Điện Biên unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.section_summary:
the state of Điện Biên, Vietnam has a population of 440,800.

We estimate Điện Biên has 9,534 people who might know Jesus, 35,358 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 395,908 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 46 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Điện Biên.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

location.name: Điện Biên
location.cities_list: Dien Bien Phu, Mường Lay, Mường Chà, Thị Trấn Tủa Chùa, Điện Biên Đông
